intro: Meibomia micrantha, commonly known as the small-flowered meibomia, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, white or pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and often have a rough texture. Meibomia micrantha is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and woodland areas.
